scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a royal court setting where a man, identified as David, kneels before a seated king, who is adorned with a crown and sits on a raised dais under a canopy. David, dressed in a yellow patterned robe and green sleeves, holds a red object in his hand and gestures towards the king. He is accompanied by a group of women, one of whom, in a blue robe, stands beside him and points towards the king. The king, in a golden robe and blue sleeves, is seated on a red cushion, holding a golden staff. The background features a richly decorated wall with medallions containing busts and inscriptions, suggesting a historical or biblical narrative. The overall atmosphere is one of supplication or presentation within an opulent interior.
